author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-670: Change RequestExecutor to allow access to the InputStream of the Http Response. To keep the same behaviour the Response Entity is still consumed on the Execute data. However instead of a String data are now stored in a byte[]. Requests for the Response data are than serverd by using this in-memory byte array. Also some adaptions to avoid deprecated API calls with httpcomponents 4.2

author: sarowe
msg: Nuke per-release Lucene javadocs in the CMS source-tree (and hence staging-tree, thanks to the Apache CMS buildbot).

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-1605] Fix user mailing list unsubscribe link

author: ilgrosso
msg: [COCOON3-102] Applying (and reworking a bit) the proposed patch for COCOON3-100, replacing URLCacheKey with URLConnectionUtils.getLastModified()
